donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The PGA aims to access factors related to the successful implementation of the REDD+ agenda, chich include legal and regulatory frameworks, capacities of key stakeholders including the goverment, judicial and legislative bodies, civil society organisations, indigenours communities and the private sector, and forest management performance.  This assessment will also take into account anti-corruption principles and issues related to land conflict dispute resolution.
